issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

1.BaseUI>Views>Mixing views
2.Tap the "I am a web view, click me" view

results: nothing occurs.

It used to be it would take a few seconds until the "click me" object would respond top the tap, now nothing occurs on tap.

{html}
fields.summary: Mixing views test case, taping into webview fails

comments.body:
{html}

The touch is a little finicky, perhaps moreso now than usual: I've been able to tap the 'click me' portion of the webview and get the label to display immediately.

Unable to duplicate under iOS 4.1 sim/4.2 iPod 3GT. Assigning back to see if it can be replicated on different hardware.

{html}

{html}

It seems better now than when I logged this - on par with 1.4.2 /1.4.1.1 so closing as resolved.

{html}
